channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Ankita"s chalknotes

item.title: Understand TCP/IP Model
item.description: An overview of the TCP/IP model’s layers, comparison with OSI model, and explanation of data encapsulation.

item.title: Understand OSI Model
item.description: A detailed breakdown of the OSI model’s key layers—Physical, Data-Link, and Presentation—and their respective protocols and limitations.
